bug.author: mayurnewase
bug.summary: Cli get command crash if bento name is not found bento meatadata store
bug.description: Describe the bug if we run command bento get InvalidBentoName:latest,cli throws [2020-09-17 19:15:39,725] ERROR - RPC ERROR GetBento: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'version' Expected behavior should give Error: bentoml-cli get failed: NOT_FOUND:BentoService InvalidBentoName:latest is not found

comments.comment:
Thanks for the PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mayurnewase>@mayurnewase</denchmark-link>
Close with this issue with the PR merged
